abstract: China imposes one-year moratorium on import of ivory carvings.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese official said the moratorium would allow the government to evaluate if a ban helps protect African elephants.

headline.main: China Bans Import of Ivory Carvings for One Year
headline.print_headline: China: Ivory Imports Banned for a Year

snippet: A Chinese official said the moratorium would allow the government to evaluate if a ban helps protect African elephants.

keywords.value: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species
keywords.name: organizations
